channel.title: Come on guys!
channel.description: We need more people on the server :) Which means advertising and making the people that have never played minecraft on moparscape play it...

item.title: Come on guys!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:380814”]We probably shouldn’t advertise it at least until we are on the current version of minecraft.[/quote]And possibly until we link some sort of online registration to minecraft?

Read full topic

item.title: Come on guys!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I wouldn’t say that it wasn’t advertised as its hard to not notice the new sub-board that was added. Also there are stickies which you can’t miss. It is there choice on whether they choose to visit the above or not.

Sent from my phone.

Read full topic

item.title: Come on guys!
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

Sorry, i meant that many people on these forums are not aware of minecraft because when the official server was set up it was not advertised to the moparscape community massively.

I didn’t mean advertising to people outside the community

Read full topic

item.title: Come on guys!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

As far as advertising it, no. David has stated that MITB wants only the MSPC/MITB community to be apart of this server. If the people who use these forums do not want to play, they don’t need to play.

Read full topic
